title: Sunday Sketch & Coffee
details: Bring your pencils and favourite sketchbook for a relaxed Sunday morning drawing circle in the old town library reading room. All levels welcome, gentle critiques, free coffee. We meet every Sunday from 10am to 12pm. Bring your own materials or borrow from our shared collection.
summary: Bring your pencils and favourite sketchbook for a relaxed Sunday morning drawing circle in the old town library reading room. All levels welcome, gentle critiques, free coffee.
disability_access: Wheelchair accessible via side entrance. Large print materials available on request.

title: Looking for sunset walking buddies
details: I finish work around 6pm in Canary Wharf and would love to join a small group for gentle riverside walks toward Greenwich twice a week. If you are nearby and fancy company, let us connect. I enjoy photography and would love to share tips with fellow walkers.
summary: I finish work around 6pm in Canary Wharf and would love to join a small group for gentle riverside walks toward Greenwich twice a week. If you are nearby and fancy company, let us connect.
disability_info: I walk at a moderate pace and can manage 3-4 miles comfortably.
additional_info: I enjoy photography and would love to share tips with fellow walkers.

title: Community hall free on Wednesdays
details: We can host up to 15 people seated or 10 yoga mats comfortably. Tables, chairs, tea urn, and projector available. Looking for crafting, discussion, or meditation groups to keep the space lively mid-week. The hall has natural light, heating, and a small kitchenette.
summary: We can host up to 15 people seated or 10 yoga mats comfortably. Tables, chairs, tea urn, and projector available. Looking for crafting, discussion, or meditation groups to keep the space lively mid-week.
available_duration: Full day (9am - 9pm) or half day options
public_transport: Bus routes 12, 25, 49 stop nearby. 10 min walk from Brighton station.
disabled_access: Ramp access, disabled toilet, wide doorways
tools_furniture: Tables, chairs, yoga mats (10), projector, screen, tea urn, whiteboard

title: Learn hand-drumming basics
details: I am a percussion tutor offering small-group hand-drumming sessions focussed on coordination, rhythm, and connection. Seeking a venue in north London plus 4-6 interested adults who enjoy world music. No prior experience needed. I provide all instruments.
summary: I am a percussion tutor offering small-group hand-drumming sessions focussed on coordination, rhythm, and connection. Seeking a venue in north London plus 4-6 interested adults who enjoy world music.
disability_access: All abilities welcome. Can adapt techniques for different mobility needs.

title: Friday Evening Pottery Circle
details: Join us for a relaxed pottery session every Friday evening. We work with clay, share techniques, and enjoy each other's company. All skill levels welcome. Materials provided for a small fee (Â£3 per session).
summary: Join us for a relaxed pottery session every Friday evening. We work with clay, share techniques, and enjoy each other's company. All skill levels welcome.
disability_access: Ground floor access, adjustable workstations available

title: Stanwick Lakes heritage garden sessions
details: In our heritage gardens we welcome volunteers. Currently we have sessions Tuesdays and Thursdays. We have a Sunday session as well, we would like to invite more participants to. Works are supervised by Hilary, venue supervised by Nadia. Tools provided.
summary: In our heritage gardens we welcome volunteers. Currently we have sessions Tuesdays and Thursdays. We have a Sunday session as well, we would like to invite more participants to.
